casebody.data:
HYGEA HOLDINGS CORP., Petitioner,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Nancy L. Allf, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Claudio Arellano; Crown Equity's LLC; Fifth Avenue 2254 LLC; Halevi Entersprises LLC; Halevi SV 1 LLC; Halevi SV 2 LLC; Hillcrest Acquistions LLC; Hillcrest Center SV I LLC; Hillcrest Center SV II LLC ; Hillcrest Center SV III LLC; IBH Capital LLC ; Leonite Capital LLC ; N5HYG LLC; and RYMSSG Group, LLC, Real Parties in Interest. No. 75215 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED MARCH 05, 2018

DENIED.
